_notes: If a file path exists for an event, Sound module plays the file instead of procedural audio. Paths relative to project root. Set to null or omit for procedural fallback. Supported formats: mp3, ogg, wav.
_example: To add an audio file: set 'merge_crystal': 'assets/audio/sfx/merge_crystal.mp3'

music._notes: Background music tracks. 'default' plays on the main board. Others can be triggered by events.
